quotes.message: Don't let your ego get too close to your position, so that if your position gets shot down, your ego doesn't go with it.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Ego is one of the biggest weapons that is used to take us down. It's self-destructive. It's a problem on all levels - even regular people can have big ego problems.
quotes.name: Yehuda Berg

quotes.message: The ego is nothing other than the focus of conscious attention.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: Ego is the immediate dictate of human consciousness.
quotes.name: Max Planck

quotes.message: The ego is not master in its own house.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Ego is a social fiction for which one person at a time gets all the blame.
quotes.name: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.message: To me the ego is the habitual and compulsive thought processes that go through everybody's mind continuously. External things like possessions or memories or failures or successes or achievements. Your personal history.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Ego is the great enemy. Ego will hold you back every single time.
quotes.name: Nikki Sixx

quotes.message: When you're older and wiser a lot of the ego has gone out of the window.
quotes.name: Billy Ocean

quotes.message: The ego is as little absolutely permanent as are bodies.
quotes.name: Ernst Mach

quotes.message: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: The greatest conflicts are not between two people but between one person and himself.
quotes.name: Garth Brooks

quotes.message: Every man who is high up likes to think that he has done it all himself, and the wife smiles and lets it go at that.
quotes.name: J. M. Barrie

quotes.message: Big egos are big shields for lots of empty space.
quotes.name: Diana Black

quotes.message: Our own self-love draws a thick veil between us and our faults.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: Letting go of your ego opens the door to taking a new and creative course of action.
quotes.name: Suzanne Mayo Frindt

quotes.message: The nice thing about egotists is that they don't talk about other people.
quotes.name: Lucille S. Harper

quotes.message: It's hard to be humble when you are as great as I am.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
quotes.name: Fred Allen

quotes.message: Well-ordered self-love is right and natural.
quotes.name: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: Ego expands to fill the space not filled with knowledge.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Armstrong

quotes.message: When ego is lost, limit is lost. You become infinite, kind, beautiful.
quotes.name: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.message: It is hard to resist a flatterer who gets it right.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: You are the sky. Everything else - it's just the weather.
quotes.name: Pema Chodron

quotes.message: The Ego is an exquisite instrument. Enjoy it, use it-just don't get lost in it.
quotes.name: Ram Dass

quotes.message: Self-worth comes from one thing - thinking that you are worthy.
quotes.name: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: I'm willing to admit that I may not always be right, but I am never wrong.
quotes.name: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.message: I live for myself and I answer to nobody.
quotes.name: Steve Mcqueen

quotes.message: Self-love seems so often unrequited.
quotes.name: Anthony Powell

quotes.message: A bad day for your ego is a great day for your soul.
quotes.name: Jillian Michaels

quotes.message: My opponent is my teacher, my ego is my enemy.
quotes.name: Renzo Gracie

quotes.message: Your ego screams for people to acknowledge you. But you must do nothing. Take it. Eat it until you’re sick. Endure it. Quietly brush it off and work harder.
quotes.name: Ryan Holiday

quotes.message: Ego trip: a journey to nowhere.
quotes.name: Robert Half

quotes.message: If the egotist is weak, his egotism is worthless. If the egotist is strong, acute, full of distinctive character, his egotism is precious, and remains a possession of the race.
quotes.name: Alexander Smith

quotes.message: Egotism is the anesthetic which nature gives us to deaden the pain of being a fool.
quotes.name: Dr. Herbert Shofield

quotes.message: If a man thinks he is not conceited, he is very conceited indeed.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: The ego is the false self-born out of fear and defensiveness
quotes.name: John O'Donohue

quotes.message: The ego relies on the familiar. It is reluctant to experience the unknown, which is the very essence of life.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: The most common ego identifications have to do with possessions, the work you do, social status and recognition, knowledge and education, physical appearance, special abilities, relationships, person and family history, belief systems, and often nationalistic, racial, religious, and other collective identifications. None of these is you.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Ego says, 'Once everything falls into place, I'll feel peace.' Spirit says, 'Find your peace, and then everything will fall into place.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: One realizes that human relationships are the tragic necessity of human life; that they can never be wholly satisfactory, that every ego is half the time greedily seeking them, and half the time pulling away from them.
quotes.name: Willa Cather

quotes.message: The secret to happiness is a small ego. And a big wallet. Good wine helps, too.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: An average man is egoistic, proud and has strong self-esteem.They always require partners who massage their ego not those who will drag their ego to the mud.
quotes.name: Agu Jaachynma N. E.

quotes.message: The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you'll be in all areas of life.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: The ego’s relation to the id might be compared to that of a rider to his horse. The horse supplies the locomotive energy, while the rider has the privilege of deciding on the goal and of guiding the powerful animal’s movement.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: We understand the ego as the complex factor to which all conscious contents are related. It forms, as it were, the centre of the field of consciousness; and, in so far as this comprises the empirical personality, the ego is the subject of all personal acts of consciousness. The relation of a psychic content to the ego forms the criterion of its consciousness, for no content can be conscious until it is represented to a subject.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: I once found an ego, crawling around and trying to shine on me. I took it in my arms and the ego turned itself into a virus. First it took over my mind , then my heart, and finally, it attempted to destroy my soul, by corrupting me with fear and guilt. Therefore, with as much energy as I could gather, I trapped the ego within my anger and pulled it out of me.
quotes.name: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.message: I like to dress egos. If you haven't got an ego today, you can forget it.
quotes.name: Gianni Versace

quotes.message: You believe your opinions,- you believe your judgments,- you believe your emotions. And these beliefs become your ego— but this ego is not you.
quotes.name: Ezra Bayda

quotes.message: Whenever I climb I am followed by a dog called 'Ego'.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Once you let go nothing dies, only the ego. You remain for ever and ever.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Ego is just like a dust in the eyes... without clearing the dust you can't see anything clearly... so clear the ego and see the world.
quotes.name: Sukh Sandhu

quotes.message: Analysis does not set out to make pathological reactions impossible, but to give the patient's ego freedom to decide one way or another.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Only in your ego are you alone.
quotes.name: Brendon Burchard

quotes.message: Ego; 'E' for excellence, 'G' for greatness, and 'O' for 'Oh, I'm so good!'
quotes.name: Artie Smalls

quotes.message: Ego death is where you find happiness . That's the only place you find happiness... . I let my ego down and then I rise back up . I let my ego down and then I'll be stronger.
quotes.name: Craig Ritchie Allan; Jahmal Gwin; Jason Brunton; etal.

quotes.message: Your ego you is what's eating at your heart . Your ego you is what tears me apart . And you're not who I've fallen in love with . Now tell me . What's running through your veins? . That got the ego you . Taking control of you.
quotes.name: Madeline Obrigewitsch and Dave Roth

quotes.message: Inflate my ego gently . Go tell them heaven sent me . Oh cause I'm so expressive . And I'm so obsessed . With my ego, my ego . And its message to inform the press . invite the guests I need the press tonight.
quotes.name: Bernie Taupin and Elton John

quotes.message: Ego is an impostor pretending to be real. . Ego is a charlatan . with quackery appeal. . Ego is a pseudonym for an impious state. . Ego is sacrilegious . to mock and imitate. . Ego is duplicity with 'doubleness' of thought. . Ego is double-dealer . leaving many distraught. . Ego is a hypocrite who's sanctimonious. . Ego is a deceiver . who's disingenuous. . Ego is a 'Robin Hood' using a poison dart. . Ego is a thespian . of histrionic art. . Ego is a basilisk of mythical report. . Ego is a hippogriff . without a life support.
quotes.name: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.message: Fear stokes that mighty, wretched ego, . Blame to wear suffering's glorious crown; . Hatred's bowels, bellows the flames of blame, . Anger's rage to beat the humble spirit down.
quotes.name: Gabriel McBride
